product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaStunna Lip Paint Longwear Fluid Lip Color
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThe FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna Stunna Lip Paint Longwear Fluid Lip Color is a lightweight, longwear liquid lipstick with a soft matte finish - born in a range of head-turning shades that look incredible on all skin tones.
details: DetailsBenefitsOne-stroke intensityHigh-impact shadesThe long-lasting matte pigment is so lightweight, you might even forget you're wearing itLip-defining precision wand makes it easy to define and fill your pout in one strokeStunna Lip Paint has no immediate feathering, staying kissably smoothFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensItem 2592343How To UseStunna Lip Paint's hyper-intense pigment performs best when activated, so shake before use!Define lips with the precision wand facing upright.Then, fill in with the precision wand facing downward.IngredientsIsododecane, Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Propylene Carbonate, Red 7 (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Stunna Lip Paint's hyper-intense pigment performs best when activated, so shake before use!Define lips with the precision wand facing upright.Then, fill in with the precision wand facing downward.

reviews.headline: I am wearing the lipstick everywhere.
reviews.comments: This purchase was a Great Find and buy.

reviews.headline: My confidence booster
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this Stunna Lip Paint. I go through so many in the color uncuffed. Apart from loving it and feeling absolutely great in it, I get so many compliments. I should get a discount or a free supply at this point!

reviews.headline: paint
reviews.comments: felt like paint on my lips it peeled of my lip a little the applicator was really nice

reviews.headline: Transfers badly
reviews.comments: It is thin, very pigmented, and long lasting. However, it transfers all day. No matter how long it has been on, it seems to never dry and will leave pigment on anything it touches.

reviews.headline: FAVORITE LIPSTICK TO DATE
reviews.comments: i have bought an embarrassing amount of these over the years, my staple lip. i do agree with what someone else had said, more colors!! but otherwise, this formula is the best matte lip on the market and i have tried over 100 different brands / colors. Thank you queen Rihanna !!! never stop being the GOAT in all formats!!!!!!!

reviews.headline: Please add more colors
reviews.comments: Love this but i need more colors please

reviews.headline: It's Okay
reviews.comments:
I fell in love with the high pigmentation and the shape of the applicator. The consistency of the lippie is on the thinner side, so a little goes along way.

I feel like you need to wear somesort of lip liner to prevent bleeding into the textures around the mouth. It takes a minute for it to dry once applied. It is NOT TRANSFER PROOF!! With that said, you kinda need to experiment with how this formula lays on your skin texture. You may need a liner, extra concealor for cleanup, prime the mouth area with something else...the list goes on. 

If you are a beginner for liquid lipstick, this isn't the one you'd want. Its too finicky and the price point isn't worth it. If you are a pro and up for some experimenting, go right ahead. Personally, I wouldn't spend so much on something thats not inclusive to all skin types.

reviews.headline: LAST LONGING
reviews.comments: I dont know how to apply this well for every day use. But i like to add a little on my top lip and then smudge the pigment. I LOVE it. Its soooooo long lasting and very pigment and pretty. A little bit goes a LONG way.

reviews.headline: One of the best
reviews.comments: I'm a waitress and this lippie stays put even if I'm working a 9+ hour day and only had to reapply once. Love it.

reviews.headline: Not universal,
reviews.comments: I dont really trust "universal" colors anyways but i wanted to give this red a try since i enjoy fenty. For anyone wondering about undertones, it has a magenta almost light purple undertone to it, and i prefer orange or yellow undertones on myself. This would look great on anyone with cool undertones i feel, i have neutral undertones and it is too berry toned on my lips for what i want. I do like the thinness of the lipstick itself, but a little goes a LONG way, and the applicator is easy for me, who is also disabled and has a hard time with my hands.

reviews.headline: It's "that" red
reviews.comments:
This has literally got to be the most iconic red out there.
I buy it over and over because of the colour.

The inly downside and reason i give 3 stars is because it does not dry and it smears constantly and it really doesnt last as long as i want it to. 
My first time wearing this was to a July 4 Party and i hooked up with a guy and lemme tell ya we both looked like party clowns afterwards. Not pretty.

If you set it with a translucent powder after application, it stays a bit better.

If youre planning on eating or kissing, babe don't wear this one.

Bjt if youre planning on serving up some iconic looks - slap it on your lips!!!

reviews.headline: It's my go to.
reviews.comments:
I originally tried a mini tube of unveil and I got so many compliments I decided to get two more colors. I bought uncensored and underdawg. Today I mixed underdawg and unveil together. I put them on at 10:30am and it is now 5pm, and I've had veggie soup and cornbread for lunch and a chicken sandwich and fries for dinner. I have not had to reapply. It lasts quite a while. 

I can't kiss my daughter without leaving a kiss print on her though. And while eating it smeared on my chin some so I had to clean that up. 

All around I think its a nice lip paint and I always recommend it.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Very natural look that is long lasting

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Very natural look that is long lasting

reviews.headline: Yes, love it
reviews.comments: I love this color and how it stays on for a long period.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Very thin and runny

reviews.headline: Smudges badly
reviews.comments: I loveeee the color on me, but it is not transfer proof/long lasting. Really disappointed because it's the perfect shade of red, but the formula really sucks.

reviews.headline: Smudges badly
reviews.comments: I loveeee the color on me, but it is not transfer proof/long lasting. Really disappointed because it's the perfect shade of red, but the formula really sucks.

reviews.headline: Beautiful Color, Bad Formula
reviews.comments: Smudges all day. It won't dry. You can touch your lips hours later and will still transfer to everything. Also, pours out of your fine lines. Such a great color, but truly not worth the purchase. They need to redo this formula.

reviews.headline: Best lip color ever
reviews.comments: This is my favorite go to super long lasting, no smudge lip color! It is by fav my favorite and I cannot believe it doesn't have 5 stars! Uncuffed is just beautiful on!

media.headline: Finally a perfect red!
media.caption: Finally a neutral that didn't turn orange or pink on my neutral  fair/light skin tone. I'll be buying more.

faceoff_positive.comments: This is a great product! It has a matte finish, but it's not dry looking. It also doesn't make your lips feel dry like many other products of this type do. It lasts very well for me. I find I can even top it with a gloss without ruining the long wear, as long as I let it dry fully before doing so. The gloss wears of but the Stunna Lip Paint stays put! The reason I gave it four stars is that I think the applicator could be better. The applicator is great for applying product to the fleshy part of the lip, but it's difficult to apply product precisely around the edges of your lips with it. I feel that a product of this type needs to be applied precisely along the lip edges to get the best effect. I've tried a lip liner, but that shortens the wear of the product, which kind of defeats the purpose of a long wear product of this type. I use a brush to apply around my lip line, and then use the applicator to apply to my lips. That works well, but it would be nice if the applicator provided could accomplish this. I must say though, the packaging is beautiful - as is all of the Fenty Beauty packaging. Of course I'd expect nothing less from Rihanna!  The only other thing I'd say is that I'd love to see more color choices in this wonderful product. I'm so glad Ulta is carrying this line now, as I prefer Ulta to any other beauty retailer. Their customer service and rewards program are the best, IMHO. Fenty Beauty and Ulta are a win-win for me!
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I fell in love with the high pigmentation and the shape of the applicator. The consistency of the lippie is on the thinner side, so a little goes along way.

I feel like you need to wear somesort of lip liner to prevent bleeding into the textures around the mouth. It takes a minute for it to dry once applied. It is NOT TRANSFER PROOF!! With that said, you kinda need to experiment with how this formula lays on your skin texture. You may need a liner, extra concealor for cleanup, prime the mouth area with something else...the list goes on. 

If you are a beginner for liquid lipstick, this isn't the one you'd want. Its too finicky and the price point isn't worth it. If you are a pro and up for some experimenting, go right ahead. Personally, I wouldn't spend so much on something thats not inclusive to all skin types.
faceoff_negative.headline: It's Okay
